_header: There is a flower sprung of a well
Subjects: Virgin Mary, hymns to; hymns, to Virgin Mary
_description: James Ryman, A hymn of the Virgin Mary and her Son Emmanuel — seven stanzas rhyme royal

CULEe112.First Lines:
There is a floure sprong of a welleTo alle mankyende whiche is
                    socoure…
CULEe112.Last Lines:
…Criste by his grete mercy & graceBringe vs alle to that
                    ioyfull place
CULEe112.Editions:
Zupitza,  Julius,
                        ed.  
             “Die Gedichte des Franziskaners Jacob Ryman.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         89 (1892): 167-338: 250.
